text: @realDonaldTrump Remember when you went to India in the middle of a pandemic not the brightest thing to do, putting Pence in charge of coronavirus, thoughts and prayers windmills on stand by shovels and rakes at the ready sharpie into that will you ex game show host occupying w.h bunker.
